gain.disclaimer: Gain range and step size as specified by the manufacturer.

phantom_power.disclaimer: Phantom power is available for microphones that require it.

contextual_applicability.disclaimer: Usage tags describe commonly observed professional contexts and do not constitute usage recommendations.
